com.yantra.api.omp.order

Interface getAvailableInventory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.OMPApi, YIFApi

    public interface getAvailableInventory

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document getAvailableInventory(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The getAvailableInventory API determines the availability of a list of items across nodes either specified or found via sourcing rules.

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableInventory

        org.w3c.dom.Document getAvailableInventory(YFSEnvironment env,
                                           org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                    throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException,
                                           java.rmi.RemoteException

        The getAvailableInventory API determines the availability of a list of items across nodes either specified or found via sourcing rules.

        Additional Information: This API behaves similar to findInventory API. Refer to that API for more details about availability.

        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD Error XML Error DTD

        User Exits:

          com.yantra.ycm.japi.ue.YCMGetItemDetailsUE
          com.yantra.ycm.japi.ue.YCMGetItemListUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSGetDeliveryLeadTimeUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSGetExternalInventoryForItemListUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSGetExternalInventoryUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSGetExternalResourcePoolCapacityUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSGetAvailabilityCorrectionsUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSGetTagNoUE
          com.yantra.ycm.japi.ue.YCMGetItemAssociationsUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.INVGetExternalSupplyUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSGetItemNodeCostForSourcingUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.INVGetSupplyCorrectionsUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.INVGetDemandCorrectionsUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSGetItemSubstitutesOverrideUE
          com.yantra.ycp.japi.ue.YCPGetNodeMinimumNotificationTimeUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSGetAvailabilityCorrectionsForItemListUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSGetExternalAvailabilityUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.OMPGetSourcedFromNodesExternallyUE
          com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.OMPGetSourcingCorrectionsUE

        Events Raised: Refer to findInventory API for list of events.

        Audits: Refer to findInventory API for list of audits.

        Pre-conditions: Refer to findInventory API for list of pre-conditions.

        Post-conditions: Refer to findInventory API for list of post-conditions.

        Output Template Support: Yes

        Database Extensibility Support: No

        Configuration Required for Backward Compatibility: No

        Additional Information:

        This API behaves similar to the findInventory API. Refer to that API for more details about availability.


        The following features are not supported in this API:

        • Procurements
        • Optimizations (such as Cost, Date, etc.)
        • Minimizing Number of Shipments Using Transfers
        • Constraints (such as Ship Complete, Ship Single Node, etc.)

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inXML - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Returns:
        An XML document that contains availability picture for the list of items. For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.

        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Java's default remote exception handler.
